text.text: What do you need to get started?
‣ First you'll need to organize your geological file structure, and develop your standard operating procedures.
Do you have the right documentation?
➜ You will need to have your health and safety certification, and all the required permits.
Which permits do you need on your claims?
⌖ Permits need to be applied for and claims managed to keep in good standing. This relies on consultation with indigenous nations and an awareness of ESG principles.
How are you communicating with stakeholders?
Your news releases need to reflect your story with presentations, maps, images, and data interpretation.
